metaphor.core: Data's intricate contraptions from 'The Goonies', with their complex chain reactions and unexpected outcomes, serve as a metaphor for event handling and propagation in React. The module explores how events trigger actions, how they can 'bubble up' through components, and how to control this propagation to ensure predictable and intended user interactions.

mapping.reactConcept: Basic React event handler: one user interaction leading to one clear, intended outcome.

mapping.fictionElement: Unintended Cascade (Map Revealer triggering parent's handler)
mapping.reactConcept: Event bubbling in React: a child component's event propagating up to its parent and triggering parent event handlers unexpectedly.

mapping.fictionElement: The Brake Pad (stopping the marble's journey)
mapping.reactConcept: `event.stopPropagation()`: preventing an event from bubbling up to parent components, isolating the event to its source.

mapping.fictionElement: Teaching the Machine to be Quiet (controlled contraptions)
mapping.reactConcept: Understanding when to use event bubbling (default) versus `stopPropagation()` for controlled UI interactions.

mapping.fictionElement: Symphony of Silence (three locks in sequence, isolated events)
mapping.reactConcept: Masterful event handling for complex interactions: coordinating sequential events where each component isolates its own events to prevent accidental triggers while maintaining precise control.

metaphor.narrativeArc: The module follows Data's contraptions from simple, predictable machines (basic event handlers) to those with unintended 'cascades' (event bubbling). It then introduces the 'brake pad' (`stopPropagation`) to control these reactions, compares the noisy vs. quiet machines (controlled vs. uncontrolled propagation), and culminates in a 'symphony of silence' (complex sequential event handling) to illustrate mastery over event flow in React.

problems: Unintended side effects from event bubbling
Performance issues from excessive event listeners (memory leaks if not cleaned up)

chapters.title: The Perfect Machine
chapters.focus: Introduces basic React event handling: predictable actions from user interactions.

chapters.title: The Unintended Cascade
chapters.focus: Demonstrates the problem of event bubbling and unintended side effects in nested components.

chapters.title: The Brake Pad
chapters.focus: Explains and demonstrates `event.stopPropagation()` to prevent event bubbling and isolate component actions.

chapters.title: Teaching the Machine to be Quiet
chapters.focus: Compares controlled vs. uncontrolled event propagation and when to use `stopPropagation()` effectively.

chapters.title: The Symphony of Silence
chapters.focus: Explores complex sequential event handling, emphasizing isolation and precise coordination for advanced UI interactions.

interactiveElements: Simulating a chain reaction with a simple event handler
Demonstrating event bubbling in nested components (with counters for parent/child triggers)
Side-by-side comparison of event propagation effects
Interactive sequence of events requiring precise control and isolation
